duties_responsibilities.duty: Train and develop a team of Guides to implement the Alpha system with world-class excellence.
Coaching your team of Guides by providing personal, actionable feedback to improve their daily performance and amplify student enjoyment and achievement.
Creating Guide Playbooks that detail best practices for facilitation, instructions on how to design more rewarding learning activities, and what to do when challenges arise.
Motivating Students by leading a small cohort of students and turning even the most reticent learner into a high-achieving student.
Leading a league of Guides—captivating leaders who breathe life into learning and ensure that students thrive, learn twice as much, and unearth their latent talents and life skills.

education_certification.credential: A Master's degree in any field (Preferably in Education)
